Tips.reallyDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
Tips.downloadStart: Starting download, the original image is large, please be patient!
Tips.downloadLicense: Image copyright belongs to the author, sharing and reprinting must follow the {{license}} license agreement!
Tips.imageHeightRequired: Image height cannot be empty and must be greater than 0!
Tips.imageWidthRequired: Image width cannot be empty and must be greater than 0!
Tips.confirmRemoveTwoFactor: Are you sure you want to remove two-factor authentication?
Tips.downloadAnyApp: Download any two-step verification mobile app:
Tips.scanQRCode: Scan the QR code with your mobile app:
Tips.enterSixDigits: Enter the 6-digit number from your mobile app:

Dashboard.starTip: If you think this project is good
Dashboard.issueTip: If you have bug feedback or suggestions

Upload.uploadTips1: Click to upload file or drag file here
Upload.uploadTips2: Vercel and other platforms Free subscription limit upload size to 6M.
Upload.uploadTips4: Maximum {count} files can be uploaded at once
Upload.title: Image Title
Upload.indexTag: Please enter image index tag, e.g., cat, do not enter special characters.
Upload.selectUploadMode: Please select upload mode, default is single file upload

List.albumDisplay: Images will be displayed in the corresponding album

Album.name: Album Name
Album.showStatusDesc: Whether to display as a route on the homepage, click to navigate to the page.
Album.randomSortDesc: When enabled, the image order will be randomly shuffled each time the album is loaded.
Album.uploadTimeNewToOld: Upload time from new to old
Album.shootTimeNewToOld: Shoot time from new to old
Album.uploadTimeOldToNew: Upload time from old to new
Album.shootTimeOldToNew: Shoot time from old to new
Album.requiredFields: Please fill in the required fields first!
Album.rootRouterWarning: / router cannot be set to hidden!

Preferences.inputWebAuthor: Please enter the website author name.
Preferences.inputFeedId: Please enter the RSS feed ID.
Preferences.inputUserId: Please enter the RSS user ID.
Preferences.inputPreviewQuality: Please enter the preview image compression quality.
Preferences.enableMaxWidthLimit: Enable Maximum Width Limit for Preview Images
Preferences.maxWidth: Maximum Width for Preview Images (positive integer)
Preferences.inputMaxWidth: Please enter the maximum width limit for preview images, a positive integer.
Preferences.inputMaxUploadFiles: Please enter the maximum number of files that can be uploaded

Account.inputEmail: Please enter the new email address.

Config.region: Aliyun OSS / AWS S3 Region, e.g., oss-cn-hongkong
Config.endpoint: Aliyun OSS / AWS S3 Endpoint, e.g., oss-cn-hongkong.aliyuncs.com
Config.bucket: Aliyun OSS / AWS S3 Bucket name, e.g., picimpact
Config.storage_folder: Storage folder (S3), strict format, e.g., picimpact or picimpact/images, leave empty or / for root path
Config.force_path_style: Whether to force path-style addressing for the bucket, default is false.
Config.s3_cdn: Whether to enable S3 CDN mode, paths will return CDN URLs, default is false.
Config.s3_direct_download: Whether to enable S3 direct upload mode, default is false.
Config.r2_direct_download: Enable R2 direct download mode (default: false)
Config.r2_storage_folder: Storage folder (Cloudflare R2). Strict format (e.g., picimpact or picimpact/images). Use '/' or leave blank for root path
